name: Girl Friend Beta: Summer Vacation Spent With You
name_original: Girl Friend Beta: Summer Vacation Spent With You
description:
Girl Friend Beta: Summer Vacation Spent With You is an adventure game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2015. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
You can play Girl Friend Beta: Summer Vacation Spent With You on PS Vita.
